name: The Weak Flame
description:
Made for the One Mechanic Game Jam 6 in 48 hours (the jam was longer but i didnt have all of the time to utilize).

Theme chosen: "Campfire"

The game automatically saves and loads when you close the game and re-open it.

Really happy with how it turned out.

Credits:

- Krassenstein (Art, Programming, Everything)
